parameters: Greetings Travellers. If you're travelling to
the shrines, may I impart some wisdom on you
Your assistance would be most welcome.
The shop downstairs sells equipment you may
find useful. Specifically equipment which is
effective against creatures of both a Solar
or Lunar nature. They can often be found
so do take care to make the proper

Greetings strangers. Might I enquire what
brings you to this corner of the Kingdom?
Just passing through. Stopping in for supplies.
Forgive my impertinence - but you and your
friends here look to be the questing sort of
people. Would that be a correct assumption?
I suppose we've been known to help in the past,
yes. I'm assuming you have such an errand in
I am Lord Varek Duskvale from Osgoth.
Osgoth? You're a long way from home.
Indeed - my business takes me far and wide
throughout the land. But that is not for you
to be concerned about. Instead, let me tell
artist would say. Let's put a blade in this
one and be done with him.
Stay thy hand, I beseech thee! I assure you
that this is all legitimate business.
Speak then, what is it you require?
If you are heading west towards Garras, you
may find yourself going past the Solar and
Lunar shrines. If you happen to be visiting
them, then perhaps you would be so kind as to
retrieve a Sun Ruby, and a Moon pearl for me?
As i'm sure you well know, those are sacred
relics kept safe by the priests tending those
shrines. I'm not one to partake in an act of
I would never ask you to stoop so low! The
clients I represent, seek merely to obtain
old, or unused relics. Or perhaps ones that
have yet to be discovered by the priests.
And just who is your client?
Professional courtesy prevents me from naming
them, but suffice to say I represent the
archeological commission of Osgoth. This is
If we can accomplish this such that we don't
cause offense or harm to the shrines - then
fine. Otherwise, you'll need to find someone
else to do your dirty work.
Ahhh wonderful! Return to me when you have
the artefacts, and I assure you, you will be

parameters.name: [Secondary] Ancient Treasures
parameters.description: 1) Obtain a Sun Ruby from the Solar shrine. \n2) Obtain a Moon Pearl from the Lunar shrine.

parameters: Long Title = "I represent the archeological commission..."
Description = 1) Obtain a Sun Ruby from the Solar shrine. \…
Fantastic! You have acquired both a Sun Ruby
and a Moon Pearl! If I could kindly just
You must be joking right? Do you take us for
Now now, no need to be so tetchy! In fact I'll
even give you an option as to your payment.
You know, if none of your options are good,
we will just hang onto these relics...
No, I assure you these are good! I am
prepared to offer you the sum of 30,000 gold
for them. However, if you find this not to
your liking, I am also at liberty to give
you this bag of Elixirs. They confer various
Tali, have a quick rifle through these will
you? Make sure they are legitimate?
Tali pushes Duskvale aside for a moment as she rifles
through the bag. She very clearly stops when her hand
touches one of the potions, as if her interest is
captured. He didn't seem to notice though - he's clearly
just eager to get this transaction over with.
more than the gold I'd say.
Yes! See? I'd hardly cheat you. Come on now,
Thank you! Now, I really must be on my way!
Thank you! Now, I really must be on my way!
What's in the bag then Tali? Remind me to
teach you a better poker face.
Sorry I just...couldn't believe it! I think
there's a portal potion in here!
It's something of a legend amongst those who
yourself to another place using simply a
That's the risky part. The legends say that
great and powerful mages used these to move
through hidden sanctums across great distances.
Tali...this is also known to our people. We
have heard similar tales, although these have
been used more for making people disappear,
So we could literally be catapulting ourselves
into certain death? There has to be a way of
figuring out where we're likely to end up.
It could be worth the risk - who knows what
loot and gear we could find, if it's an
I'm all for exploring - but shall we try to
at least gain some knowledge on this first,
before we quite literally, go looking for

Good travels to you, stranger. If you are ever interested
in learing new combat techniques, bring me a Tome of Combat
and I will teach you what you need to know.
What's this you have there? A Tome of Combat? If you are
interested, I can teach one familiar in the art of
swordsmanship something useful from the manuscript. Let's
Elim has learned the Swordsmanship skill: Reckless Zeal!
I'm sorry friend, come back when you have sufficient coin.
